name: Transparent Wallpaper
description: Not only Transparent BG from now on

BG.name: Switch
BG.description: Removes the blue blendings of Background.

extra.name: Extra Layers
extra.description: Some menu pages doesn't have a background at all, this mod allows you toggle them optional.

frame.name: Remove Frames
frame.description:
Set the frames in Edit Level Layer and LevelSearchLayer to invisible transparent
You can enable it individually (This option works even when <cb>Transparent BG</c> option is disabled)

dark.name: Dark Timely/Event/Gauntlets
dark.description: Set the background of Gauntlet levels and Daily/Weekly/Event Levels darker, to make them look different from general levels from search engine

loading.name: Loading Circle
loading.description: Modify the loading circle and its round base when the game loads the level in Level Info Menu.

plate.name: Loading Plate Color
plate.description:
Customize the color of the loading module's round plate.
Suggest a color similar to your background

circle.name: Loading Circle Color
circle.description:
Customize the color of the color of the loading module's round plate.
Suggest a color that differs as far as possible to your plate color
